column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////EXCELLENT DEEP DISH! The setup was somewhat awkward when we walked in. It was a busy Friday night so we had to give our name to the hostess (who was not clearly identified) and then place our order at the counter before being seated. I realize this is necessary because deep dish pizza takes a while to cook and it's pointless to hold up a table with a long wait time. I just wish the system was directed better. We were seated within 40 minutes and served our pizza within 15 minutes of being seated. This place is touristy
column2: but it's so yummy and a must when in Chicago! Order a small sausage deep dish for 2
column3: but if VERY hungry order a medium! Great spot!
